message: TIP: make it clearer where in the growl-esque notifications you can click to go see the thread it's about, as I got the impression the top part isn't clickable but I couldn't tell.
TIP / feature request:  allow direct-linking to comments with the time stamp as a link (but don't add an underline except on hover).
TIP / feature request:  quick-view most-starred comments in a thread, for when you show up late to a discussion and want to get a quick update on what's going on.
We should maybe do some kind of text-underline to make it more clearly links
TIP / feature request:  when searching for something, if no results are found, add a "Would you like to create a group about this?" button.
@KuraFire super smart
OMG YES. Hahaha. I was wondering what was up with my music… :-)
haha yeah
You can mute it by clicking the sound icon at the top
Yeah, just noticed that now while looking for settings. I kinda like the sounds, but also, profilic.
prolific. I can type, I swear.
TIP: try having multiple tabs open for a while and see the chaos that ensues. Some server-checking refreshing might be useful ;)
Oh fuck yes I love the growl-style notifications in-site.
Yeah, that's what I was gonna suggest actually, making the link part have a text underline when you hover over it.
Word.
TIP / feature request: make this site less fun and addictive. Seriously, lest it becomes my biggest time sink since I discovered masturbation.

TIP / request: make it clearer what joining a group means. I now see that it appears you can post topics into public groups without having joined them, so does joining only mean "get notifications from" ?  In that case, make a distinction between public/private and say "Subscribe" vs. "Join"  given that you'd need to join private groups before you can read/write its messages
Are there sounds playing?
haha
Yeah...known bug...we know we need to fix that.
I just keep punting on doing it, because it's a do-it-quick-vs-do-it-right scenario
TIP / feature request: centralized notifications page where you can adjust whether to receive emails for all of your groups easily. (having to go to the group itself can be cumbersome)
TIP / feature request: guidelines on how to add images (which I've seen embedded along the way).
Feedback: on the home page, the  twitter account link isn't aligned correctly with the stuff on the right. Small, minor detail, but has possibly gone by unnoticed.
TIP / feature request: re: previous centralized notifications page, I think the second "Create new group" button on the home page (the gray one) could be better used as a "Manage groups" button.
Obviously all of the things I'm putting in here are my quick, opinionated ideas which may not have any merit to your intentions for the site, and that's okay. :)
@KuraFire Its to the left in the recent topics module.
TIP / feature request: a "Mark all as read" button in the Groups drop-down if you see that all new activity is in threads you don't care to follow.
with more states
BTW, I really like metafilter's way of showing it, though it needs icon love. Not automatically showing each user that has starred a comment, just a total of people who did
@justinlilly That's limited to the current group, not the entire site.
Sweet. :)
TIP / feature request: try a different approach to starred comments; it currently feels like a comment with a star from someone cannot be starred by you anymore, because it's already "lit".
@KuraFire agree, I thought the same thing about stars
@KuraFire agreed, we're working on some new icons for the stars
a count isn't nearly as cool
What MeFi does is let you click on it if you want to see who exactly starred it, btw
I think we're going to leave the person's nam in
That's fair
TIP / feature: Instead of "Are you sure you want to mark this group as read?", why not say "Are you sure you want to mark all items in [group name here] as read?"  ?
